mods.abstract: Image of four women wearing hats with flowers on them and standing on the street. Two of the women are wearing buttons, including red ones which read "No MegaCity." In the background are several other people, including a man in a brown hat who appears to be helping hold up a banner behind the women. The banner reads: "Toronto Raging Grannies Peace and Justice." In the distance behind the man, part of a sign reading "Please Support [ ] Boycott Cineplex Odeo[n] Professional Projectionists lock out [ ] can be seen."
mods.accessCondition: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca
